original_title: 実録! ! ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 15
overview: The 15th installment of a series of horror videos submitted by viewers. Psychic researcher Itsuki Udo thoroughly inspects posted horror videos, such as psychic phenomena recorded on home videos and ghosts captured on surveillance cameras. A concept of fear is reflected in the accident-prone scene.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 15
